//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "talker_right", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	wait ( 3000.000 );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "talker_left" );
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "LINER1" );

	task ( "Why" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/liner1/guard01/01bridge.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "LINER1_007" );
	}

	dowait ( "Why" );

	affect ( "talker_left", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "talker_right" );

		task ( "captain" )
		{
			sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/liner1/guard02/01captain.mp3" );
			set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "LINER1_008" );
		}

		dowait ( "captain" );

		affect ( "talker_right", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
		{

			task ( "key" )
			{
				sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/liner1/guard01/02key.mp3" );
				set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "LINER1_009" );
			}

			dowait ( "key" );

			affect ( "talker_left", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "NULL" );

				task ( "cabin" )
				{
					sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/liner1/guard02/03chief.mp3" );
					set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "LINER1_012" );
				}

				dowait ( "cabin" );

				affect ( "talker_right", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
				{
					set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "NULL" );

					task ( "thanks" )
					{
						sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/liner1/guard01/03thanks.mp3" );
						set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "LINER1_011" );
					}

					dowait ( "thanks" );
					use ( "opening_over" );
					run ( "liner1/talker_left" );
					run ( "liner1/talker_right" );
				}

			}

		}

	}

}
